@ Furious1964

It's a periodic problem with TPB. Click on the magnet link and it should work. Also, you could find this torrent on t o r r e n t z(.)c o m and dl from one of their many links.

It is neither fake nor virus.

magnet link works like a charm.
many thx for the awesome up!
